channel.title: I need help with my compiler!
channel.description:
Hey moparscape, I need help! I am using Project 2006 source, and none of the compilers work! Ive tried 2 different ones!
the first one is this:
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
but when I try to compile it gives me this error:
[code]server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
_________________
And I have tried this compiler:
[code]@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_22/bin/javac.exe" *.java @echo You have compiled the Client/Server. pause[/code]
and it gives me this error:
[code]server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors You have compiled the Client/Server. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
_______________________
And yes I Have set this:
[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javaw.exe[/code] to my correct version.
If anyone can help me fix this error, that would be appreciated

item.title: I need help with my compiler!
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

i took it out and it worked for him, no compile errors.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with my compiler!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“tivo444, post:12, topic:407943”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=509230.msg3694497#msg3694497 date=1312339038]

sure add me on skype or msn
details are in siggy

He doesn’t have to add you to fix this simple error.

server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors You have compiled the Client/Server. Press any key to continue . . .
Go to the 43594; and type enter.
[/quote]
your a stupid nooby buttfag[/quote]
Well your a retard that changed your compiler even though it has nothing to do with the info.

[quote=“mrdrzj, post:11, topic:407943”]unexplainable, the main idea is that its fixed.
kthxbai[/quote]
No it’s not fixed, you just took it out because you don’t know what your doing.

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“mrdrzj, post:9, topic:407943”]i already fixed it he had after his port he had 43594;serverequals=43594
i just removed the serverequals=43594
its fixed for him now long time ago before u posted[/quote]
Why would you delete that? That is what the client uses to connect to the server using that port…

item.title: I need help with my compiler!
item.dc:creator: @tivo444 tivo444
item.description:
@tivo444 wrote:

Hey moparscape, I need help! I am using Project 2006 source, and none of the compilers work! Ive tried 2 different ones!

the first one is this:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit

but when I try to compile it gives me this error:

server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

And I have tried this compiler:

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_22/bin/javac.exe" *.java @echo You have compiled the Client/Server. pause

and it gives me this error:

server.java:47: illegal start of type public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ server.java:47: illegal start of expression public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; 43594=default ^ 2 errors You have compiled the Client/Server. Press any key to continue . . .

And yes I Have set this:

to my correct version.

If anyone can help me fix this error, that would be appreciated

Read full topic
